Heading: Review
Note: The full text of a review in a third-party publication in any medium

Heading: ‘One locality, one book’ program
Note: (North America) Inclusion in a program such as ‘Chicago Reads’, ‘Seattle Reads’

Heading: Curated list
Note: For example a ‘best books of the year’ or ‘25 books you should have read’ list, without regard to their bestseller status
